plot: The gang's attempt to disrupt The Network's plans backfires leaving one of them in danger. Arby's confession to Jessica has damaging repercussions while Becky is left with an impossible choice.

Jessica obtains the manuscript from Arby after he has told her they are siblings and Dugdale and his wife successfully get Anya released on condition she sells them her baby. Becky makes a call to her drug dealer Donaldson, who promises a limitless supply if she can find him the manuscript. Letts is not Mr Rabbit but explains that the Network's plan is to flood the market with the chemicals to curtail over-population and Becky and Ian are appalled that Wilson approves the idea. Wilson in fact releases Letts whilst the others are out but Letts is killed by his assistant and Geoff on his return to Corvadt. Having shown Milner samples of the vaccine taken from Letts Ian, Alice and Grant take them to Dugdale, but he betrays them by calling the police and Grant is arrested.—don @ minifie-1
